title: doTERRA Lifelong Vitality Daily Packs | dTERRA Essential Oils
description:
With the purchase of one Lifelong Vitality Pack on an LRP or an Enrollment Order, choose up to 3 additional targeted supplements at significant savings!

As one of doTERRA's most popular products, doTERRA Lifelong Vitality Pack is full of essential nutrients, metabolic benefits, and powerful antioxidants designed to help promote energy, health, and lifelong vitality. The same great doTERRA Lifelong Vitality Pack products you know and love is now available in individual Daily Packs. doTERRA Lifelong Vitality Daily Packs are a convenient on-the-go solution and easily fit in your backpack, suitcase, or gym bag.

doTERRA Lifelong Vitality Pack is also available in the traditional 3 bottle kit.
cleaned_text: "Gift of the Earth." With the purchase of one Lifelong Vitality Pack on an LRP or an Enrollment Order, choose up to 3 additional targeted supplements at significant savings! As one of doTERRA's most popular products, doTERRA Lifelong Vitality Pack is full of essential nutrients, metabolic benefits, and powerful antioxidants designed to help promote energy, health, and lifelong vitality. The same great doTERRA Lifelong Vitality Pack products you know and love is now available in individual Daily Packs. doTERRA Lifelong Vitality Daily Packs are a convenient on-the-go solution and easily fit in your backpack, suitcase, or gym bag. doTERRA Lifelong Vitality Pack is also available in the traditional 3 bottle kit. The doTERRA Lifelong Vitality Program makes taking the first step on the path toward a lifetime of vitality and wellness convenient and affordable. Our lifelong health and vitality depend on many factors including diet, physical activity, weight management, rest, stress management, exposure to toxins, and inherited genetic predisposition for disease or wellness. While some of these variables are beyond our complete control, breakthrough scientific research is revealing many ways we can influence—and even control—significant factors of aging and wellness. A long life full of vitality and healthy aging begins with providing your cells with essential nutrients and metabolic factors to help them perform optimally. Customize your kit by choosing up to three of the following products at significant savings (LRP Only): Take the contents of one packet with food 2 times daily, morning and evening. Each packet contains 2 [Alpha CRS+](/US/en/p/alpha-crs-plus) capsules, 2 [xEO Mega](/US/en/p/xeo-mega) softgels, and 2 [Microplex VMz](/US/en/p/supplements-daily-vitality-microplex-vmz-food-nutrient-complex) capsules. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
